title: MSDA_Bootcamp
text:
Code
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

# Define the schedule data

schedule <- tibble(
  Date = c("2025-08-26", "2025-08-26", "2025-08-27", "2025-08-28", "2025-08-29",
           "2025-08-29"),
  Time = c("09:30 AM - 12:20 PM", "14:00 pm - 16:50 PM", "14:00 PM - 16:50 PM",
           "14:00 AM - 16:50 PM", "09:30 AM - 12:20 PM", "14:00 AM - 16:50 PM"),
  Topic = c("Welcome, Overview and Review of Calculus",
            "Review of Linear Algebra",
            "Introduction to R (and RStudio)",
            "Data Visualization with ggplot2",
            "Data Wrangling with tidyverse",
            "Elements of Probability and Statistics")
)

# Convert Date to a more readable format
schedule <- schedule %>%
  mutate(Date = format(as.Date(Date), "%B %d, %Y"))

# Create the table

kable(schedule, format = "html", table.attr = "class='table table-striped'",
      col.names = c("Date", "Time", "Topic")) %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = F, position = "left") %>%
  add_header_above(c("Schedule" = 3))











Schedule



Date
Time
Topic




August 26, 2025
09:30 AM - 12:20 PM
Welcome, Overview and Review of Calculus


August 26, 2025
14:00 pm - 16:50 PM
Review of Linear Algebra


August 27, 2025
14:00 PM - 16:50 PM
Introduction to R (and RStudio)


August 28, 2025
14:00 AM - 16:50 PM
Data Visualization with ggplot2


August 29, 2025
09:30 AM - 12:20 PM
Data Wrangling with tidyverse


August 29, 2025
14:00 AM - 16:50 PM
Elements of Probability and Statistics

## Schedule

```r
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

# Define the schedule data

schedule <- tibble(
  Date = c("2025-08-26", "2025-08-26", "2025-08-27", "2025-08-28", "2025-08-29",
           "2025-08-29"),
  Time = c("09:30 AM - 12:20 PM", "14:00 pm - 16:50 PM", "14:00 PM - 16:50 PM",
           "14:00 AM - 16:50 PM", "09:30 AM - 12:20 PM", "14:00 AM - 16:50 PM"),
  Topic = c("Welcome, Overview and Review of Calculus",
            "Review of Linear Algebra",
            "Introduction to R (and RStudio)",
            "Data Visualization with ggplot2",
            "Data Wrangling with tidyverse",
            "Elements of Probability and Statistics")
)

# Convert Date to a more readable format
schedule <- schedule %>%
  mutate(Date = format(as.Date(Date), "%B %d, %Y"))

# Create the table

kable(schedule, format = "html", table.attr = "class='table table-striped'",
      col.names = c("Date", "Time", "Topic")) %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = F, position = "left") %>%
  add_header_above(c("Schedule" = 3))
